Subject: Move from Nutanix to VMWare by SSH
Description:
How we can move the virtual appliance from nutanix to vmware ? If we will do it, we need a SSH login . Can you support us please ? 
best regards
Christian
What_We_Know__c:
2025.05.06:
The customer enquired about steps on how to move their EPP virtual appliance from Nutanix to VMWare.  We advised the customer of a better way and that is to migrate over to vmware by deploying a new EPP appliance and then do the migration using our System Backup V2.  Complete backup and migration will require: System Backup v2 + Audit Log Backup.
Next_Steps__c:
2025.05.07:
Customer confirmed that they have activated the trial licenses and all steps worked fine and that we can can close the ticket.
